original_title: Simple Plan: No Pads, No Helmets... Just Balls 15th Anniversary Tour!
overview: Back in April 2017, Simple Plan filmed a full live show at the House of Blues in Anaheim, California, where they performed as a part of their No Pads, No Helmets… Just Balls tour that celebrated the 15th anniversary since the release of their debut album.  So if you missed the chance to be a part of this tour in the U.S., Canada, Mexico, Europe, Japan, Australia or New Zealand a couple years ago, here’s your chance to experience the live show from the comfort of your couch.  Now pour yourself a drink of your choice, we’re gonna be here a while. Check out Live in Anaheim 2017 below
title: Simple Plan: No Pads, No Helmets... Just Balls 15th Anniversary Tour!
